de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer

Class RegexTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer.AbstractTokenizer<Substring>
      • de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer.RegexTokenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tokenizer<Substring>

    public class RegexTokenizer
extends AbstractTokenizer<Substring>
    Allows to split texts into substrings using regular expressions.
    Since:
    1.2.0
